com.ibm.sterling.afc.jwt.auth.claimparser

Interface IPLTJWTClaimsParser


  • public interface IPLTJWTClaimsParser
    Interface which provides functions to obtain an authenticated valid user from the claims present in the JSON Web Token(JWT) body, after JWT verification is successful. This can be implemented to write custom handling for obtaining a user from the JWT claims. Single instance of the implementation is reused for a given JWT issuer.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.lang.String getAuthenticatedUser(java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Object> claimsMap)
      This function parses the claims present in the JWT body and returns a valid OMS user id based on the claims.

    • Method Detail

      • getAuthenticatedUser

        java.lang.String getAuthenticatedUser(java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Object> claimsMap)
                               throws PLTJWTUserMappingException
        This function parses the claims present in the JWT body and returns a valid OMS user id based on the claims. This user id will be considered as authenticated and may be used further for OMS api calls.The returned user must be a valid existing user. claimsMap - a Map representing all the claims present in the JWT body String PLTJWTUserMappingException
        Throws:
        PLTJWTUserMappingException
